thread.title: Claudia Ferraro
thread.title_full: HostelsClub recensione scritta da Claudia Ferraro

author: Claudia Ferraro
title: Claudia Ferraro
text:
I did a mistake with reservation and the Hostel in amstredam and the staff of Hostels Club resolve my problem fast and with kindness.They help me without lost money and time.
Congratulation.
Excellent service
I raccomand to evrybody.
Thank you Hostels Club
